description.lang: This product can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications. All non-battery operated nodes within the network will act as repeaters regardless of vendor to increase reliability of the network.

Lifeline between controller and KMS-Z10 Supported command classes Battery report, Notification report, and Device Reset Locally notification Sensor can max associate 1 nodes in each group Sensor supports one association groupings.
